title: Saraki knocks AbdulRazaq as bandits kill 12 vigilantes, hunters in Kwara
description: Armed bandits attacked Oke-Ode community in Ifelodun LGA, Kwara State, killing 12 vigilantes and hunters.
description_with_more_context: Armed bandits attacked Oke-Ode community in Ifelodun LGA, Kwara State, killing 12 vigilantes and hunters.

title: Nigeria: Bandits Kill 11 Forest Guards, One Community Head in Kwara
description: Rampaging bandits shot dead 11 forest guards and one community head in Okeode, Ifelodun LGA, Kwara State.
description_with_more_context: Rampaging bandits shot dead 11 forest guards and one community head in Okeode, Ifelodun LGA, Kwara State.

title: JUST IN: Bandits Strike Again in Kwara, Kill One, Another Injured
description: Bandits raided Marri Village in Patigi LGA, Kwara State, killing one person and injuring another while stealing motorcycles.
description_with_more_context: Bandits raided Marri Village in Patigi LGA, Kwara State, killing one person and injuring another while stealing motorcycles.
